Dashboard.description:
This dashboard provides key metrics for monitoring Java Stack - Jolokia JVM, Redis, Mongodb, Tomcat,Apache Httpd, 
using InfluxDB and Telegraf.

targets.query:
SELECT mean("heap_memory_usage_used") FROM "jolokia" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Jolokia$/) AND $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description:
Unix timestamp of last save to disk
Number of changes to the database since last dump
panels.title: Persistence Metrics

list.name: Host
list.query: show tag values from system with key = "host"

list.label: JolokiaAgentHost
list.name: Jolokia
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jvm_runtime" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: TomcatHost
list.name: tomcatHost
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "tomcat_connector" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: MongoDB Host
list.name: MongoDBHost
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "mongodb" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: RedisHost
list.name: RedisHost
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "redis" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: Apache Httpd
list.name: HttpServer
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "apache" WITH KEY = "host"

Dashboard.title: ApplicationMonitoring
